title: Drawing, "Textile design: large flower heads on patterned ground", 20th century
medium: Brush and black and white gouache on white paper.
inscribed:
Lower center graphite: 4 coleurs
Upper center graphite: 233
Upper right: graphite: 62
description: Large white flower heads with black centers, some petals with tiny daisy motifs, on black ground covered with sprigs of white daisy motif.
